description: This script is a bootstrapper for a database visualizer component. It conditionally installs Node.js dependencies, checks for required tools, and starts the visualizer server if specific environment variables and conditions are met. The script handles setup, dependency management, and process launching with error handling to prevent failures from halting execution.

methods.name: finish_ok
methods.description: Outputs a completion message and exits the script successfully.

methods.name: install_dependencies
methods.description: Removes existing node_modules and lock files, then installs dependencies using npm, adapting the command if a lockfile is present.
